Hi there,

Welcome to my site! I am a coder, designer and snowboarder. I speak English and Chinese, but most of the time in Java and Python.

Currently I am a graduate student in the School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University, here I have been involed in many challanging projects on the cloud. Before this, I worked on data mining in the Chinese Academy of Sciences, my research fields includes Text Mining and NLP. If you have any question or working opportunity, please feel free to contact me.
